brief.content-text:
Four Diagrams

Diagram 1, Interactive

The diagram depicts the backside of a common desktop system unit. Special consideration has been given to the ports available for peripheral connection to the PC. These ports are as follow: PS/2, USB, serial, parallel, VGA, RJ-11, and RJ-45 connections. When the button associated with a port is clicked, a brief description is displayed along with a photo of the actual cable connector that plugs into the port type.
